summary: Encapsulates the configuration, execution, and post‑processing of MODFLOW‑6 groundwater flow and transport simulations, handling multiple coupled models, exchange relationships, time discretization, data I/O, and utilities for splitting and regridding the simulation.
business_intent: Provide hydrogeologists and water‑resources engineers with a streamlined interface to set up, run, and analyze coupled flow‑transport MODFLOW‑6 models, supporting scenario management, result extraction, and model coupling for environmental and water‑resource decision making.
